title: Homotopy group
summary: In mathematics, homotopy groups are used in algebraic topology to classify topological spaces. The first and simplest homotopy group is the fundamental group, denoted Ï€ 1 ( X ) , {\displaystyle \pi _{1}(X),} which records information about loops in a space.
